mim.name: ReqEquipmentDiscovery
mim.description: Used to perform AISG Device Scan. Scan finds all radio RF and RET ports in RBS. It lists all AISG units with their unique HW IDs and how they are connected. Operator can select file storage.

enum.name: DeviceScanDcVoltage
enum.description: The value represents the nominal DC voltage supplied to the antenna system during device scan. Please note that choosing a higher voltage than the maximum voltage capability of the antenna equipment may cause permanent damage to the antenna equipment. Choosing a too low voltage may cause unsuccessful result for large installations due to maximum current supply limitation in the Radio.

enum.name: AisgDataRate
enum.description: The bit rate used for communication with the AISG units.

enumMember.name: BITRATE_9600
enumMember.description: The transmission bit rate is 9600 bps.

enumMember.name: BITRATE_38400
enumMember.description: The transmission bit rate is 38400 bps.

enumMember.name: BITRATE_115200
enumMember.description: The transmission bit rate is 115200 bps.

enum.name: DeviceScanPortConfiguration
enum.description: Port Configuration used for full device scan.

enumMember.name: SCAN_ALL_PORTS_WITH_DEFAULT_VOLTAGE
enumMember.description: All ports are scanned. No change to default voltage configuration.

enumMember.name: SCAN_ALL_PORTS_WITH_CHOSEN_VOLTAGE
enumMember.description: All ports are scanned using chosen voltage.

enumMember.name: SCAN_RET_PORT_ONLY
enumMember.description: Sets output DC voltage to 0 for RF Ports. Only RET ports are scanned.

derivedDataType.name: EcimPasswordString
derivedDataType.description: This type enables secure handling of passwords.

class.name: EquipmentDiscovery
class.description: Used to perform AISG Device Scan. Scan finds all radio RF and RET ports in RBS. It lists all AISG units with their unique HW IDs and how they are connected. Operator can select file storage.

action.name: antennaDeviceScan
action.description: Starts a scan of connected AISG units. The scan result is stored on the chosen FTP server. It contains the unique ID and device type of the detected units, and how the units are connected to the RBS. The result can be used to detect and correct configuration errors in the antenna system, such as the unique ID of cascaded ARET units. If any equipment connected to the antenna system is not rated for 30 Volts then there is a risk that it will be permanently damaged. Note that the scan result is incomplete if any of the connected devices are not operational. This also applies if the connection to any device is broken, or if any of the corresponding radio units do not support device scan. The state of the scan can be observed through attribute antennaDeviceScanStatus. A complete scan can take several minutes.

parameter.name: dataRate
parameter.description: The bit rate used for communication with the AISG units during device scan.

parameter.name: portVoltage
parameter.description: The value represents the nominal DC voltage supplied to the antenna system during device scan. Please note that choosing a higher voltage than the maximum voltage capability of the antenna equipment may cause permanent damage to the antenna equipment. Choosing a too low voltage may cause unsuccessful result for large installations due to maximum current supply limitation in the Radio.

parameter.name: server
parameter.description: The IP address or hostname of the FTP server storing the file.

parameter.name: path
parameter.description: The file path where to store the result file.

parameter.name: userName
parameter.description: The user name to the FTP server storing the file.

parameter.name: password
parameter.description: The password to the FTP server storing the file.

action.statusInformation: Since L17A. Replaced by performFullAntennaDeviceScan. Planned to be removed.

action.name: performFullAntennaDeviceScan
action.description:
Scans connected AISG units and stores results on the SFTP location indicated by sftpServerIpAddress and sftpServerPath. Contains unique unit ID, device type and how units are connected to RBS. Result is used to detect and correct configuration errors in antenna system, such as unique ID of cascaded ARET units. SFTP credentials are stored in attributes: sftpServerIpAddress, sftpServerPath, sftpUsername and sftpPassword. Scan state can be observed through attribute antennaDeviceScanStatus. Complete scan can take several minutes.
NOTE: Scan result is incomplete if any connected device is not operational. Also applies for broken connection to any device, or if corresponding radio units do not support device scan.
action.dependencies: Must not be run simultaneously as downloadSoftware on AntennaNearUnit.
action.specification: 3GPP TS 25.462, V8.0.0 luant data link layer, device scan.
action.disturbances: Executing this action can cause permanent damage to antenna system equipment, when using high values for parameter portVoltage
action.precondition: Attribute antennaDeviceScanInBackground must be set to false. Action antennaDeviceScan on NodeMangementFunction not running. Action performFullAntennaDeviceScan on EquipmentDiscovery not running. Action downloadSoftware on AntennaNearUnit not running. Attributes sftpServerIpAddress, sftpServerPath, sftpUsername, sftpPassword, dataRate, portVoltage, portConfiguration must be specified.

attribute.name: antennaDeviceScanStatus
attribute.description: Status of ongoing performFullAntennaDeviceScan operation and Antenna Device Scan in background.

attribute.name: equipmentDiscoveryId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: antennaDeviceScanInBackground
attribute.description: If true, Antenna Device Scan is run periodically in background. Scan results contain only ALDs that are not configured. Only configured ports are scanned. Result file is stored in SFTP location indicated by sftpServerIpAddress and sftpServerPath.
attribute.precondition: Attributes sftpServerIpAddress, sftpServerPath, sftpUsername, sftpPassword must be set in order to start Antenna Device Scan in background.

attribute.name: sftpServerIpAddress
attribute.description: IP address or hostname of SFTP server that stores file.

attribute.name: sftpUsername
attribute.description: User name to SFTP server that stores file.

attribute.name: sftpPassword
attribute.description: Password to SFTP server that stores file.

attribute.name: dataRate
attribute.description: Bit rate used for communication with AISG units during execution of performFullAntennaDeviceScan action. Not used by Device Scan in background.

attribute.name: portVoltage
attribute.description:
Nominal DC antenna voltage supplied to system during execution of performFullAntennaDeviceScan action.
NOTE: High voltage can cause permanent damage to some antenna system equipment. Low voltage can cause unsuccessful result for large antenna system configurations.
Not used by Device Scan in background.
attribute.disturbances: High voltage can cause permanent damage to antenna system equipment.

attribute.name: portConfiguration
attribute.description: Can choose which ports are configured with given DC voltage. Not used by Device Scan in background.
